title: Facebook’s Efforts to Attract Young Users Come Under Senate Scrutiny
sub_head: Commerce panel convenes hearing after Journal reporting showed company knew Instagram was harmful to many of its young users
body:
WASHINGTON— Facebook Inc.’s efforts to expand its reach among young people will attract scrutiny Thursday by members of the Senate Commerce Committee, who want to know more about the social-media giant’s research into how its products affect children.
The inquiry comes after Wall Street Journal reporting showing Facebook’s internal research found that its Instagram app was harmful for a sizable share of its millions of young users.
